original: @483a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @483a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya sarba buddha bi sha ya aa ba t'a ra dzny'a na a'a lo ka aa lam ka ra n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
analyzed: a'arya sarba buddha bi sha ya aa ba t'a ra dzny'a na a'a lo ka aa lam ka ra n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
translated: Ārya-sarva-buddha-viṣaya-avatāra-jñāna-āloka-ālamkāra-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Noble Great Vehicle Sūtra called The Ornament of the Light of Wisdom Entering the Domain of All Buddhas.

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Part One

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time,

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri'i rtse mo bzhi'i shing drung chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri'i rtse mo bzhi'i shing drung chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang na 'di lta ste /
translated: the Blessed One was dwelling on the peak of Vulture Peak Mountain, in the palace of the essence of the dharmadhātu, under a tree, together with this assembly:

original: nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / kun shes koondi n+ya la sogs pa dge slong nyi khri lnga stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po @483b thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa /
analyzed: nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / kun shes koondi n+ya la sogs pa dge slong nyi khri lnga stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po @483b thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa /
translated: the eight great hearers, such as Ājñātakauṇḍinya, and a great saṅgha of twenty-five thousand monks, all of whom were arhats whose defilements were exhausted,

original: nyon mongs pa med pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa /
translated: They were free of afflictions.

original: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
analyzed: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
translated: They had attained mastery.

original: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /🔽shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba / shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
translated: Their minds were completely liberated.🔽Their wisdom was completely liberated.

original: cang shes pa /
analyzed: cang shes pa /
translated: They were self-controlled.

original: glang po chen po /🔽bya ba byas pa /
analyzed: glang po chen po / bya ba byas pa /
translated: They were great elephants.🔽They had done what had to be done.

original: byed pa byas pa /
analyzed: byed pa byas pa /
translated: They had done their duties.

original: khur bor ba /
analyzed: khur bor ba /
translated: They had laid down their burden.

original: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
analyzed: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
translated: They had accomplished their own goal.🔽They had exhausted all the bonds of existence.

original: srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa; yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa; yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
translated: Their minds were completely liberated through true knowledge.🔽They had reached the perfection of the highest mastery over all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang 'di lta ste /
translated: They were:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nor dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman yang dag 'phags la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis kun nas bkye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nor dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman yang dag 'phags la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis kun nas bkye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog
translated: and the bodhisattvas Śrīnirghoṣa, Śrīmati, Śrīśāradvatīputra, Bhaiṣajyarāja, Bhaiṣajya-saṃpurṇā, and so on, who had been sent by quintillions of tathāgatas from other world systems, all of whom were irreversible from awakening,

original: pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba /
analyzed: pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba /
translated: had turned the wheel of the Dharma,

original: thams cad kyang shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo yongs su zhu ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyang shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo yongs su zhu ba la mkhas pa /
translated: were skilled in requesting the teaching of the Ratnakuṭa-sūtra of the vaipulya class,

original: thams cad kyang sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob pa /
translated: had attained the tenth bhūmi, the Cloud of Dharma,

original: thams cad kyang shes rab kyis ri rab ltar gyur pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyang shes rab kyis ri rab ltar gyur pa /
translated: had become like Mount Meru through their insight,

original: thams cad kyang stong pa nyid @484a *//
analyzed: thams cad kyang stong pa nyid @484a *//
translated: and were all skilled in the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i sems su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i sems su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: and the mind of the absence of attributes, the absence of aspirations, non-arising, non-occurrence, and non-entity.

original: thams cad kyang chos zab mo'i snang ba chen po thob pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos zab mo'i snang ba chen po thob pa /
translated: All of them had attained the great illumination of the profound Dharma.

original: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa /
translated: All of them had the conduct of the tathāgatas.

original: thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyangs pas nges par 'byung ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyangs pas nges par 'byung ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
translated: All of them were abiding in the nature of the essence of all the aspects of deliverance through the training in higher knowledge.

original: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur ba dang / stobs dang / shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi gtam brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur ba dang / stobs dang / shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi gtam brjod par bya zhing /
translated: At that time the Bhagavān thought, “I will give a Dharma discourse in order to generate the great power, strength, and speed of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba dag bsdu bar yang bya /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba dag bsdu bar yang bya /
translated: I will gather together the bodhisattva mahāsattvas of great splendor from as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River.

original: bdag gis chos bstan pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa'i ltas snang ba chen po'ang bstan par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis chos bstan pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa'i ltas snang ba chen po'ang bstan par bya /
translated: I will display the great light that is the sign of my teaching the Dharma discourse of the great teaching of the Dharma.

original: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lhags nas bdag la chos bstan pa chen po yongs su zhu bar 'gyur bar yang @484b bya'o; ;snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lhags nas bdag la chos bstan pa chen po yongs su zhu bar 'gyur bar yang @484b bya'o; ;snyam du dgongs so //
translated: I will cause the bodhisattva mahāsattvas to come and request from me the great teaching of the Dharma.’

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med cing bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'od zer chen po'i sprin dag gis snang bar mdzad
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med cing bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'od zer chen po'i sprin dag gis snang bar mdzad
translated: “Then the Bhagavān, at that time, with a great cloud of light rays illuminated as many world realms in the ten directions as there are atoms in three inexpressible quintillions of world realms.

original: do // de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum brag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag lhags so //
analyzed: do // de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum brag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag lhags so //
translated: At that time, from each of the ten directions, bodhisattva mahāsattvas as numerous as the atoms in a million quintillion ineffable buddha realms arrived.

original: de dag la byang chub sems dpa' re re'ang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis 'ongs te lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
analyzed: de dag la byang chub sems dpa' re re'ang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis 'ongs te lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
translated: Each of those bodhisattvas arrived through inconceivable bodhisattva magical manifestations. Having arrived, they made inconceivable, suitable offerings to the Bhagavān.

original: spyan sngar rang rang gi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i padma'i stan dag la 'khod de //
analyzed: spyan sngar rang rang gi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i padma'i stan dag la 'khod de //
translated: Then, in the presence of the Bhagavān, they sat upon seats of lotuses that arose through the power of their own aspirations.

original: bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing sdod par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing sdod par gyur to //
translated: They remained there, gazing upon the Bhagavān with unblinking eyes.

original: de'i tshe na chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang de'i dbus su sengge'i khri nor bu rin po che chen po'i padma'i snying po can rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag grangs med pa yod pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe na chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang de'i dbus su sengge'i khri nor bu rin po che chen po'i padma'i snying po can rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag grangs med pa yod pa /
translated: In the center of the palace of the essence of the realm of phenomena there was a lion throne with a heart of a great jewel lotus, extending for countless millions of leagues,

original: rim gyis mtho ba /
analyzed: rim gyis mtho ba /
translated: gradually rising,

original: nor bu rin po che kun tu snang ba las grub ba /🔽nor bu @485a *//🔽rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che kun tu snang ba las grub ba / nor bu @485a *// rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba /
translated: made of the jewel of universal light,🔽with a rim of the jewel of the lightning lamp,

original: nor bu rin po che 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba /
translated: surrounded by a fence of the jewel of inconceivable light,

original: nor bu rin po che dpe med pas yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che dpe med pas yongs su bskor ba /
translated: surrounded by the jewel of the incomparable,

original: nor bu rin po che snang ba dpe las 'das pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che snang ba dpe las 'das pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa /
translated: adorned with a garland of the jewel of the example-transcending light,

original: nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g-yogs pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g-yogs pa /
translated: covered with a net of the jewel of the king of power,

original: nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs spras pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs spras pa /
translated: adorned with various jewels,

original: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgred pa dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to //
analyzed: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgred pa dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to //
translated: It was adorned with parasols, victory banners, and flags.

original: sengge'i khro nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po can de'i khor khor yug nas 'od zer grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu byung ste /
analyzed: sengge'i khro nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po can de'i khor khor yug nas 'od zer grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu byung ste /
translated: From the four sides of the lion throne, which was the essence of a great precious jewel, ten hundred thousand quintillion light rays issued forth.

original: 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
translated: Those light rays pervaded the worlds in the ten directions with a great light.

original: yang de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
analyzed: yang de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
translated: At that time, from each of the ten directions came gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, mahoragas, Śakras, Brahmās, Lokapālas, and many hundreds of thousands of quintillions of bodhisattvas.

original: tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang lhags par @485b gyur te; de dag las kha cig ni /
analyzed: tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang lhags par @485b gyur te; de dag las kha cig ni /
translated: and Brahma and the world guardians, as numerous as the atoms in a million quintillion ineffable buddha-fields, had also gathered.

original: rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod la /
analyzed: rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod la /
translated: Some of them were seated in jeweled towers,

original: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab ba glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dag dang lhags so //🔽kha cig ni /
analyzed: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab ba glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dag dang lhags so // kha cig ni /
translated: accompanied by countless, inconceivable trillions of goddesses singing and playing music.

original: me tog las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /🔽tsandan sprul gyi snying po dag pas byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: me tog las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni / tsandan sprul gyi snying po dag pas byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: Some were made of flowers,

original: mu tig las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /🔽rdo rje las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: mu tig las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni / rdo rje las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: some of sandalwood, some of uragasāra sandalwood,🔽some of pearls, some of diamonds,

original: nor bu rin po che rdo rje ltar snang ba las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che rdo rje ltar snang ba las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: some of the precious diamond-like jewels,🔽and some of the precious jewels of the ocean.

original: dzambu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: dzambu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: some were made of gold from the Jambū River,

original: nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /🔽nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: some were made of the precious jewel that gathers all lights,🔽some were made of the precious jewel king of power,

original: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: some were made of the precious wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni /
translated: some were made of the precious jewel held by Indra,

original: rgya mtsho'i rten rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i bkod pa stong lta bu rin po che chen po kun nas 'od zer snang ba las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag la khod la /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i rten rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i bkod pa stong lta bu rin po che chen po kun nas 'od zer snang ba las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag la khod la /
translated: and some were made of the great jewel that shines with light from a thousand pure precious arrays of ocean supports.

original: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med cing bsam gyis mi @486a *//
analyzed: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med cing bsam gyis mi @486a *//
translated: Innumerable, inconceivable trillions of divine maidens arrived,

original: khyab pa'i glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dag lhags so //
analyzed: khyab pa'i glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dag lhags so //
translated: singing songs and playing musical instruments.

original: lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa las kyang shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa byas te /
analyzed: lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa las kyang shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa byas te /
translated: Having arrived, they made inconceivable, incomparable, immeasurable, and inexpressible offerings to the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i stan dag la 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum pas lta zhing sdod par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i stan dag la 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum pas lta zhing sdod par gyur to //
translated: In the presence of the Blessed One, they sat down on seats that arose through the power of their own aspirations and remained there, gazing upon the Blessed One with unblinking eyes.

original: de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dzambu'i chu bo'i gser las grub par kun tu gnas par gyur cing /
analyzed: de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dzambu'i chu bo'i gser las grub par kun tu gnas par gyur cing /
translated: At that time, this trichiliocosm became filled with the gold of the Jambū River.

original: nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dag gis legs par brgyan pa dang / lha'i me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang / gos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / tsandan sprul gyi snying po'i shing ljon pa dag dang /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dag gis legs par brgyan pa dang / lha'i me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang / gos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / tsandan sprul gyi snying po'i shing ljon pa dag dang /
translated: It was adorned with various great precious jewels, divine flower trees, cloth trees, and sandalwood trees.

original: spos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / aa ga ru'i shing ljon pa dag gis kyang legs par brgyan cing /
analyzed: spos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / aa ga ru'i shing ljon pa dag gis kyang legs par brgyan cing /
translated: It was also adorned with incense trees and aloeswood trees.

original: nor bu rin po che nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / glog gi sgron ma'i dra bas kun nas khebs ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang ldan la /
